1-10 of 25 Chinese Restaurants - La Quinta, CA
Distance Within City Within 1 mile Within 2 miles Within 5 miles Within 10 miles Within 20 miles Sort by highest rated first alphabetical order most reviewed first closest first best match ★★★★★ 4 Reviews Soul Of China 50855 Washington St # 2f, La Quinta, CA "The food there is top knotch. It's great. It has a lot of flavor. They make you feel like you are eating in China by the way they ..." ★★★★★ 3 Reviews Fong Lam Chinese Restaurant 49707 Harrison St, Coachella, CA "really good i cant get enough of it nice girls awesome service" ★★★★☆ 3 Reviews City Wok 74970 Country Club Dr # 450, Palm Desert, CA "City wok is a fun, delicious dining experience. Sit at the bar if you want to watch them feverishly prepare your stir fry. The food is always cooked ..." ★★★★★ 2 Reviews Mulan Chinese Restaurant 82005 Us Highway 111, Indio, CA "Nice place with great menu. Service is okay. Waiting time can improve. I've invited family and friends over and we've always had a great time." ★★★★☆ 2 Reviews China Wok 77912 Country Club Dr # 31, Palm Desert, CA "Since I discoverd China Wok a week ago, I have eaten there four times! The food is great! The Hot and Sour Soup was very distintive and good. ..." ★★★☆☆ 3 Reviews Tsing Tao Chinese Cuisine 74040 Highway 111 # E, Palm Desert, CA "Tsing Tao is a nice clean little restaurant in a modest storefront. They have tablecloths, linen napkins, and pleasant service. This is definately an upscale place, compared to ..." ★★★☆☆ 1 Review Li Li's Chinese Restaurant 40100 Washington St # 141, Indio, CA "Li Li's has just average quality Chinese Food at low prices. There are some basic tables and chairs for eat-in, but most of the business is take out. ..." ★★☆☆☆ 1 Review China Jo's 78550 Highway 111, La Quinta, CA "This place is just a typical California low-budget Chinese fast food restaurant. The food is only passible. The prices are low. (About $6 for a plate of food.) ..."
